create onesecprice table

create array
Long Average
get short array
Store values in macd table
func:
msg.symbol = flow.get("symbol")
msg.ux = flow.get("ux")
msg.longEMA = flow.get("longEMA")
msg.shortEMA = flow.get("shortEMA")
let signal = msg.longEMA - msg.shortEMA
msg.signal = signal.toFixed(3)

msg.query = "insert into macd (symbol, longux, datetime, longEMA, shortEMA, signal) values ('" + msg.symbol + "'," + msg.ux + ", TO_TIMESTAMP("+ msg.ux +") ," + msg.longEMA + "," + msg.shortEMA + "," + msg.signal+ ") ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;"
//node.warn(msg.query)    
return msg;

name: calculate bands
func:
// msg.avg is the moving average price for the past 20 seconds

msg.avg = flow.get("avg") 
msg.std = flow.get("std") * 2
msg.avg = Number(msg.avg)
msg.std = Number(msg.std)
//node.warn("Avg: " +msg.avg+ " Std: " +msg.std)

msg.ux = flow.get("ux")
msg.bbul = msg.avg + msg.std
msg.bbll = msg.avg - msg.std 
msg.ux = flow.get("ux")
msg.symbol = flow.get("symbol")

msg.query = "update onesecprice set bbul = " +msg.bbul+ ", bbll = " +msg.bbll+ " where unixtime = " + msg.ux + ";"
//node.warn(msg.query)

return msg;
